name: TurboTax 2024 Tax Return
summary: A TAX2024 file is a tax return file created by the 2024 version of Intuit TurboTax, a software application for preparing and filing U.S. Federal and State tax returns. It stores tax information for the 2024 tax year, including Federal IRS forms, State tax forms (if applicable), and user-provided personal and financial data. TAX2024 files are useful for archiving, transferring, or continuing tax return preparation.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
